placeAMarker: Place a marker for every verse with
standardBackgroundVideo: The default background is a blurred music video
videoIsGenerating: Video is generating. Settings can't be changed anymore.
instrumentalFeature: The instrumental feature allows you to generate and use an instrumental version of the selected song.
customAudioFeature: With the custom audio feature you can import your own audio in all common audio formats.
lang60fpsFeature: When 60 FPS is selected Lyrixx will render the video in 60 FPS allowing an even smoother video.
acceptTOS: By clicking register, I agree to Lyrixx's Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
troubleConnectingTryAgain: Trouble connecting to the server. Please try again later.
currentlyOffline: You're currently offline. Please establish an internet connection.
serverDeniedRequest: Server denied your request. Please try again.
serverDeniedRequestMultipleTimes: Server denied your request. It looks like the error occurred multiple times. Please restart Lyrixx
internalServerError: An internal server error has occurred. Please try again.
internalServerErrorMultipleTimes: An internal server error has occurred. It looks like the error occurred multiple times. Please try again later.
noEmailFound: No user with is email found.
usernameTooShort: The username must be at least 3 characters long.
passwordTooWeak: The password is to weak. It must be at least 6 characters long.
userAgreementNotAccepted: The user agreement must be accepted.
emailIsInUse: The email is already in use.
verifyYourEmail: Please verify your email before subscribing to Lyrixx Extra.
signInBeforeSubscribing: Please sign in or create an account before subscribing to Lyrixx Extra.
siteReloaded: The site has to be reloaded in order to delete the temporary data
selectSong: Please select a song before loading the audio
loadAudioBeforeGenerating: Please load the audio before generating the video
noLyricsAvailableContinue: No lyrics available for this song. You may continue without lyrics
noLyricsAvailable: No lyrics available for this song
loadSongBeforeChanging: Please load a song before changing lyrics
recordLyricsAgainOrContinue: Record lyrics again or continue with current lyrics
selectBackground: Please select a background image or deactivate this option
selectAudio: Please select an audio or deactivate this option
errorUpdating: There was an error while trying to update Lyrixx
